items.kid_gloss: Plants that glow in the dark.
items.hook_question: How do some plants glow without light?
items.mini_task: Find a picture of a glowing plant.

items.kid_gloss: Huge ant groups that work together.
items.hook_question: Why do some ants form mega colonies?
items.mini_task: Draw a map of an ant colony.

items.kid_gloss: Animals that use sunlight like plants.
items.hook_question: Can animals really use sunlight to live?
items.mini_task: List animals that might use sunlight.
